dialogue: I was ridiculously lucky. The end.
I was hoping you'd include something about all of my hard work.
You didn't work any harder than your gardener, and he lives in his truck.
What about my vision and my intuition?
My first draft had a chapter on your hallucinations and magical thinking.
But I covered that ground with the title: "I'm a delusional sociopath and you can too."
I'm starting to regret paying you in advance.
